title: weird torch.diag behavior on variable
body_html:
Does torch.diag work on variables without calling .data ? I'm getting weird behavior:

x = Variable(torch.ones((5,5)))
print(torch.diag(x)) # prints diag
print(torch.diag(x,2)) # still prints middle diag
print(torch.diag(x.data, 2)) # prints correct diag

Seems like a bug to me, since other ops work fine on variables. At the least it's confusing. If so, Point me in the right direction and I'll certainly try fixing it :)

Does torch.diag work on variables without calling .data ? I'm getting weird behavior:

```
x = Variable(torch.ones((5,5)))
print(torch.diag(x)) # prints diag
print(torch.diag(x,2)) # still prints middle diag
print(torch.diag(x.data, 2)) # prints correct diag
```

Seems like a bug to me, since other ops work fine on variables. At the least it's confusing. If so, Point me in the right direction and I'll certainly try fixing it :)
